#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,sum;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
        {
            string s;
            cin>>s;
            sum=0;
            for(i=0;s[i]!='\0';i++)
                {
                    if(s[i]>='0' && s[i]<='9')
                        {
                            sum+=s[i]-'0';
                        }
                }
            cout<<sum<<endl;
        }
return(0);
}
